channel.title: Project Bloody Matter
channel.description:
Welcome to project Bloody Matter. I wanted to mix everything around! Ok well this is a new project i am looking into few servers to use. I need something good. Also a good team!
-Client I want! I want it like rs moving firecape and clan chat... Also the interface... Etc... We may start with something not to good and update it :)
[b]!To Do List![/b] Get forums- get server code server get [b]GOOD[/b] client release
!Already Done! Starting place - Yanell
Bloody Matter Team Hosters - -
Coders - - - - - - - -
Testers ((Closed)) - - - - - -
Client Designer - - - - - -
Forum Team - - - - - -
[center]Application [code]Aplliaction Form Name: Postion wanted: Prove: Have you EVER done this before: How much will you be online[/code][/center] [pre]Bloody Matter[/pre]
NOTE: NEED BANNER MAKER!
